articles.title: Apple MacBook Pro 13-Inch (2022, M2) Review - PCMag
articles.description: The 2022 reboot of Apple's 13-inch MacBook Pro gets points for its peppy new M2 processor, which delivers a raw-performance uptick, and remains an iconic design. But we'd have liked to see more daring innovation on the rest of the laptop.
